Articles.Content: Im looking for an awesome lander that can land on anything and is attachable to a interplan ship, but to my surprise there is little around, iv found a couple of simple landers but nothing great, tried them and they dont fly great. Is no one really into making landers? Ideally that can carry rovers? :/
Make your own if you can't find one impressive enough.
Ok... i'm not sure if this si the right place to post this... but, don't worry, i'll made a lander + rover for you
most of the people here will say build your own, that is why you don't find to many as most simply build there own. Half the fun in ksp is designing the different types of vehicles!
I don't make a lander that can "land on everything"... I always customize a lander for its target body (or bodies).

The different worlds require quite different landing approaches. Small chutes will do on Eve but many chutes are required on Duna, RCS is strong enough for Gilly but Tylo requires as much thrust as taking off from Kerbin, etc. That's why you're not seeing many one-size-fits-all landers.
I imagine that if you make a lander that can get to orbit from Eve and that can land on Tylo (and maybe add some parachutes while you're at it), you can do just about anything with it.

I did design universal lander. It can land and start from anything except Eve. But it is heavily modded, as i needed it for my Grand Tour Lite - which used a single mothership with unimpressive TWR forcing me to cut down weight where it was possible. Anyways - use Kerbal Engineer Redux for data about TWR and deltaV of your constructions.

http://www./?dgs32zi4gcdqvam

Ok, here you got one...

It can land on any body, i guess...

Edited July 23, 2013 by Pachi3080

Interesting thanks guys.

Also I play the game with deadly reentry and Ion Cross life support to make it much more realistic, but also alot harder, as I need life support stuff, I guess why I find it v hard to make a lander! lol And why I rather make one for either side of my interplanetary.

I'm really into landers. I have a two stage lander that is able to land on the Mun or similar bodies and can also make a powered landing and return from Duna's surface.

Craft

http://www./download/99sh41kg00ri3p1/Sandpiper_Lander.craft
This does literally everything you asked, you just need a bunch of mods.

Three stock landers in my shipyard... one is a Mun lander, two are Duna landers....

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/41575-Mulbin-s-Ships!-All-in-one-place!

Three stock landers in my shipyard... one is a Mun lander, two are Duna landers....

I was actually about to link those as well.
Thanks for the updates guys, im just not great at building stuff with good power/weight ratios,lol, Ill take a look at these and mod them to include life support and heatshields
